content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be an excellent place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price that fits within my budget. Could you tell me your best offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I understand that every tenant has their own budget. However, I also have to consider the value of my property and the current market rates. I'm willing to negotiate a price that is fair for both parties. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm quite budget-conscious. I'd like to offer 600 Euro per month for the apartment. Is this a price we can discuss?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euro per month is certainly a starting point for discussion. While I appreciate your offer, I must be honest and say that it is below my expectations for this apartment. It's a brand new, centrally located property with all the amenities nearby. I believe it deserves a higher rental value. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. The location and quality of the apartment are certainly attractive. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm also mindful of my budget as a student. Could you provide me with your counter-offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm open to negotiation. However, I must ensure that the rental price reflects the value of the apartment. I'm willing to consider your budget as a student, but I must receive an offer that aligns with the market value. Would you be willing to increase your offer to 700 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and amenities of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer of 700 Euro per month is a significant increase from my initial offer. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I must remain within my budget as a student. Could we find a middle ground between 600 and 700 Euro?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm willing to work with you to find a price that suits both our needs. How about this: if you're willing to increase your offer to 650 Euro per month, I'll consider it a fair deal considering the market value and your budget as a student. Would you be comfortable with that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 650 Euro per month is more aligned with my budget as a student. I'm willing to accept this price. I agree to the price of 650 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. Welcome to your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
